name: 3310 Thrower
description:
This is my submission for the NOKIA 3310 JAM 2, which is also my first game jam i ever joined. 

Description:

Try wrecking your phone by throwing it as far as possible. Bombs allow you to boost the phone by spamming the "numpad 5" or "spacebar" as fast as possible.

Controls:

  • Numpad 4 / Left key: Left
  • Numpad 5 / Spacebar: Action
  • Numpad 6 / Right key: Right

Thank you for playing.
